matches.name: EU Innovation Fund
matches.description:
The EU Innovation Fund supports startups in Kosovo and Western Balkans countries with innovative solutions that contribute to sustainable development and economic growth.

Funding is available for early-stage startups with a prototype or MVP that addresses key challenges in Kosovo. The grant covers development costs, market validation, and initial scaling activities.

The selection process includes an initial application review, followed by a pitch to a committee of experts. Successful applicants receive funding in milestone-based tranches with ongoing mentorship from EU business advisors.

matches.name: KOSBAN Angel Network
matches.description:
KOSBAN Angel Network connects Kosovo's diaspora investors with promising local startups. The network focuses on early-stage investments in technology, agriculture, and sustainable development sectors.

Investments typically range from €25,000 to €75,000 in exchange for equity stakes between 5-15%. In addition to capital, startups gain access to the extensive business networks of KOSBAN members across Europe and North America.

The application process includes initial screening, due diligence, and a pitch to the investment committee. Successful startups receive funding and ongoing support from their investor partners.

matches.name: BKT Startup Loan
matches.description:
BKT Bank's Startup Loan program offers favorable financing terms for Kosovo-based businesses with at least 6 months of operations. The loan features lower interest rates than standard commercial loans and flexible repayment options.

The program includes a 6-month grace period on principal repayments and terms up to 5 years. Loans can be used for equipment purchases, working capital, or operational expansion.

Applications require a business plan, financial projections, and proof of operations. BKT's dedicated startup banking team provides guidance throughout the application process.
